solution_line_template: In her hamper, Brie has {total_blouses} x {blouses_percent_num}% = <<{total_blouses}*{blouses_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={blouses_in_hamper}>>{blouses_in_hamper} blouses.
In her hamper, she has {total_skirts} x {skirts_percent_num}% = <<{total_skirts}*{skirts_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={skirts_in_hamper}>>{skirts_in_hamper} skirts.
In the hamper, she has {total_slacks} x {slacks_percent_num}% = <<{total_slacks}*{slacks_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={slacks_in_hamper}>>{slacks_in_hamper} slacks.
She will need to wash {blouses_in_hamper} + {skirts_in_hamper} + {slacks_in_hamper} = <<{blouses_in_hamper}+{skirts_in_hamper}+{slacks_in_hamper}={total_to_wash}>>{total_to_wash} pieces of clothes.
